name: Light vs Dark (itch)
description:
A game where a light guy and a dark guy encounter and they will not show themselves easy.Defeat the dark guy and go to a green dimension for private reasons

Controls: the controls button is old and it doesn't show the latest buttons because I didn't have time for that so here are the controls: left to go left, right to go right, shift to crouch,z to jump, space to shoot.
